qas.question: Can Npos match the wages of public and private sector employers?

answers.text: will never be able to match the pay

qas.question: What should NPOs focus on offering employees instead of high wages?

answers.text: benefits packages, incentives and implementing pleasurable work environments

qas.question: What is better than having high pay at an NPO?
How much should an NPO pay employees?

answers.text: as much as they are able

qas.question: What are other incentives that NPO emplotees can be offered instead of higher wages?

answers.text: generous vacation allowances or flexible work hours

plausible_answers.text: benefits packages, incentives and implementing pleasurable work environments

qas.question: What benefits should the private sector focus on offering?
What benefit is voted higher than flexible hours and vacation?

plausible_answers.text: as much as they are able

qas.question: How much are private companies encouraged to pay?

plausible_answers.text: a low stress work environment that the employee can associate him or herself positively with

qas.question: What type of environment do private sector workers look for?
What will the private sector never be able to match compared to NPO's
